channel.title: What will the next big auxy genre be?
channel.description: Since auxy got it’s following, there have been phases of genres of music we’ve been producing. It started in 2018-2019 with the futurebass era of auxy, and now 2019-2021 we’ve seen the Chillsynth/synthwave era of auxy. I’d like to hear the best guesses as to what the next big trend will be. I’ll leave my thoughts on the matter as well.

item.title: What will the next big auxy genre be?
item.dc:creator: AzureOnyx
item.description:
Realistically speaking, popular genres will influence how Auxy artists create music. Hard to tell what the next genre will be, but 2000s nostalgia is starting to hit hard, so I wouldn’t be surprised if that ends up being the next dominantly genre used in Auxy.

Read full topic
item.source: What will the next big auxy genre be?

item.title: What will the next big auxy genre be?
item.dc:creator: Vokon
item.description:
Since this has gotten quite a bit of attention, I’ll leave my thoughts on it. I personally see a lot of current synthwave artists shifting to making house music. The kind with a lot of 909 drums and jazzy chord progressions. The best example is tolberto. I hope it goes this way, it’s a very fun genre to make

Read full topic
item.source: What will the next big auxy genre be?
